import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import './cards.css' import imgDoight from '../../assets/img/doight.svg' import imgFleche from '../../assets/img/triangleHautBas.svg' import carrer from '../../assets/img/groupe.svg' import { useRef } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' export default function Cards({color,setcolor}) { const englobeCardTitre =useRef({}); const titreCard = useRef(); const cardUne = useRef(); const cardTrois = useRef(); const cardDeux = useRef(); return (
Collections are your most

important pages, but are

frustrating to manage

Non-Visual

Curation

Manually curating your collections

feels like doing your taxes.

Limited

Sorting

It's too basic to sort your collections

by "New in" or "Best Sellers".

Messy

Data

You need 5 tabs open to take data-

driven decisions from excell sheets.
